statements: SELECT * FROM music_genre_preferences;
SELECT user_id, user_name, age FROM music_genre_preferences ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT user_name, music_genre, preferred_artist FROM music_genre_preferences WHERE gender = 'female';
SELECT user_name, age, music_genre FROM music_genre_preferences WHERE age >= 25 ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, user_name, music_genre, preferred_artist FROM music_genre_preferences WHERE music_genre = 'Rock' OR music_genre = 'Pop';
SELECT * FROM music_genre_preferences WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT user_name, music_genre, preferred_artist FROM music_genre_preferences WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT user_name, age, music_genre FROM music_genre_preferences WHERE music_genre = 'Pop' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM music_genre_preferences WHERE gender = 'Female' AND music_genre = 'Rock' ORDER BY user_name ASC, age DESC;
SELECT user_name, gender, preferred_artist FROM music_genre_preferences WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY gender, user_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM music_listeners WHERE age > 30;
SELECT listener_id, location FROM music_listeners WHERE genre_preference = 'Pop';
SELECT * FROM music_listeners WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT genre_name FROM music_genres WHERE genre_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM music_listeners WHERE location LIKE 'New%';
SELECT * FROM music_listeners WHERE age > 25 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT listener_id, genre_preference FROM music_listeners WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_listeners FROM music_listeners;
SELECT gender, COUNT(*) AS total_listeners FROM music_listeners GROUP BY gender;
SELECT ml.listener_id, mg.genre_name FROM music_listeners ml JOIN music_genres mg ON ml.genre_preference = mg.genre_name;
SELECT * FROM demographics ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT id, gender FROM demographics WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT genre, rating FROM music_preferences WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY genre DESC;
SELECT location, age FROM demographics WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age > 30;
SELECT group_name FROM demographic_groups ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, age, gender, location FROM demographics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT user_id, genre, rating FROM music_preferences WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT group_name, group_description FROM demographic_groups WHERE LENGTH(group_description) > 20 ORDER BY group_name ASC
SELECT id, age, gender, location FROM demographics WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY id
SELECT user_id, genre, rating FROM music_preferences WHERE genre = 'Rock' AND rating >= 3 ORDER BY user_id
SELECT * FROM demographics;
SELECT user_id, age, gender FROM demographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, location FROM demographics WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT genre_name FROM genres ORDER BY genre_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE activity_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM demographics ORDER BY age DESC, gender ASC, location
SELECT d.user_id, d.age, d.gender, g.genre_name FROM demographics d JOIN user_preferences up ON d.user_id = up.user_id JOIN genres g ON up.genre_id = g.genre_id WHERE up.rating > 3
SELECT u.user_id, u.age, u.location, a.activity_date FROM user_activity a JOIN demographics u ON a.user_id = u.user_id WHERE a.genre_id = 2 AND u.gender = 'Female'
SELECT d.location, COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM demographics d GROUP BY d.location HAVING total_users > 10 ORDER BY total_users DESC
SELECT u.user_id, g.genre_name, a.activity_date FROM user_activity a JOIN demographics u ON a.user_id = u.user_id JOIN genres g ON a.genre_id = g.genre_id WHERE u.age >= 25 AND u.age <= 35
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT user_id, gender, age FROM Users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT song_name, artist_name, Genres.genre_name FROM Songs JOIN Genres ON Songs.genre_id = Genres.genre_id;
SELECT Users.user_id, Users.location, UserPreferences.preference_level FROM Users LEFT JOIN UserPreferences ON Users.user_id = UserPreferences.user_id;
SELECT Demographics.region, Users.gender FROM Demographics INNER JOIN Users ON Demographics.user_id = Users.user_id WHERE Demographics.age_group = 'Young Adult';
SELECT user_id, age, gender, location FROM Users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT song_name, artist_name, genre_name FROM Songs INNER JOIN Genres ON Songs.genre_id = Genres.genre_id;
SELECT user_id, genre_id, preference_level FROM UserPreferences WHERE preference_level > 3 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT demographic_id, age_group, region FROM Demographics WHERE region LIKE '%USA%' ORDER BY demographic_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, MAX(age) AS max_age, MIN(age) AS min_age FROM Users GROUP BY user_id;
